Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bombinin-H6 (bombinin H isomers; Frogs, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: H6 does not display any microbicidal activity against all the microorganisms tested.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: H6 shows the greatest activity, causing 60% hemolysis at a very low peptide concentration (4 ÂµM).

Literature.Title: Structure-Function relationships in bombinins H, antimicrobial peptides from Bombina skin secretions.
Literature.Author: Mangoni ML, Grovale N, Giorgi A, Mignogna G, Simmaco M, Barra D.
